name: Mr Tuba - The Last Resort
description:
You are the last resort of humankind

Most of the world's population have turned into zombies. The wise scientists have found a cure, but not everyone is aware of that fact.

Mr Tuba is one of them. His opinion is to launch nuclear weapons to locations that are pre-defined. He has the launch code in his pocket and he is running towards the computer of doom. If he reaches it and pushes the button, it is all over.

You have to prevent it from happening. You have to save the world.

How to play

Movement = Arrows and WASD
Attack = CTRL and MOUSE1

Why?

Created for the Playmaker Game Jam 2018

Assets used
  • Playmaker (+ Ecosystem)
  • Standard Assets *
  • TextMesh Pro
  • ProBuilder
  • ProGrids

* tiny modification to existing ThirdPersonCharacter.cs for preventing player movement 

Models
  • Voxel characters were made with MagicaVoxel
  • Models were rigged with armature with Blender
  • Animations using Mixamo with these own models

Big thanks for tcmeric, Eric Vander Wal, for guiding me how to get the models from Mixamo and using them in Unity

 Sound-effects

Recorded with Audacity

Music

Created with Rytmik Ultimate

Lessons learned
  • Using Playmaker and EcoSystem
  • How to use Blender to rig the model
  • How to use Mixamo for own models
  • Using animations in Unity

I think that this was great experience to learn more about Unity and Playmaker. Already thinking new projects where I can use this knowledge I gained during creating this game for the jam.

* Alike of game characters are purely accidental and does not take any political, religion or anything similar topic to discussion.
